ThingDef.label: psychoid leaves
ThingDef.description: Raw cut leaves of a psychoid plant. Can be refined into various form of the stimulant drug psychite.

ThingDef.label: ambrosia
ThingDef.description: A soft, rare fruit. Ambrosia tastes wonderful and produces a subtle mood-increasing chemical high. However, if eaten too often, it can generate a mild addiction.

ThingDef.label: berries
ThingDef.description: Assorted berries. Nice to eat, even when raw.
